  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DirectSearcherReference  
    EventuallyConsistentIndexUpdater  
    FailedFulltextIndexPopulator  
    FulltextIndexAccessor  
    FulltextIndexBuilder  
    FulltextIndexCapability  
    FulltextIndexPopulator  
    FulltextIndexProceduresUtil  
    FulltextIndexProgressor  
    FulltextIndexProvider  
    FulltextIndexReader  
    FulltextIndexSettings  
    FulltextIndexSettingsKeys
    Responsible for naming of
    FulltextIndexTransactionState
    Manages the transaction state of a specific individual fulltext index, in a given transaction.
    FulltextIndexTransactionStateVisitor
    A TxStateVisitor that adds all entities to a TransactionStateLuceneIndexWriter, that matches the index according to the FulltextSchemaDescriptor.
    FulltextResultCollector  
    FulltextResultCollector.EntityResultsMaxQueueIterator
    Produce entity/score results from the given priority queue, assuming it's a max-queue that itself delivers entries in descending order.
    FulltextResultCollector.EntityResultsMinQueueIterator
    Produce entity/score results from the given priority queue, assuming it's a min-queue which delivers entries in ascending order, so that they have to be reversed before we can iterate them.
    FulltextResultCollector.EntityScorePriorityQueue
    Organise entity ids by decreasing scores, using a binary heap.
    FulltextResultCollector.ScoredEntityLeafCollector  
    IndexUpdateSink
    A sink for index updates that will eventually be applied.
    LuceneFulltextDocumentStructure  
    LuceneFulltextDocumentStructure.DocWithId  
    LuceneFulltextIndex  
    NullIndexUpdateSink
    An implementation of IndexUpdateSink that does not actually do anything.
    PreparedSearch  
    ReadOnlyFulltextIndex  
    ScoreEntityIterator
    Iterator over entity ids together with their respective score.
    ScoreEntityIterator.ConcatenatingScoreEntityIterator  
    StatsCachingIndexSearcher
    An index searcher implementation delegates to the given StatsCollector for computing its term and collection statistics.
    StatsCollector
    Collect, aggregate and cache Lucene index statistics that span multiple index searchers.
    TransactionStateLuceneIndexWriter  
    WritableFulltextIndex
